mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TRAVEL_TBL VALUES (SEQ_TRAVEL_NO.NEXTVAL, #{travelName}, #{travelAddr}, #{travelInfo}, #{travelUrl}, #{travelTel}, #{travelUsingTime}, #{travelHoliday}, #{travelParking}, #{travelLocation}, #{travelTags}, DEFAULT, DEFAULT, 0, DEFAULT, DEFAULT)
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT (*) FROM TRAVEL_TBL A, TRAVEL_FILE_TBL B WHERE A.TRAVEL_NO = B.TRAVEL_NO AND A.TRAVEL_STATUS = 'Y' AND B.TRAVEL_FILE_NO = (SELECT max(TRAVEL_FILE_NO) FROM TRAVEL_FILE_TBL WHERE TRAVEL_NO = A.TRAVEL_NO)

SELECT A.TRAVEL_NO, A.TRAVEL_NAME, A.TRAVEL_ADDR, A.TRAVEL_LOCATION, A.TRAVEL_TAGS, A.TRAVEL_VIEW_COUNT, B.TRAVEL_FILE_RENAME FROM TRAVEL_TBL A, TRAVEL_FILE_TBL B WHERE A.TRAVEL_NO = B.TRAVEL_NO AND A.TRAVEL_STATUS = 'Y' AND B.TRAVEL_FILE_NO = (SELECT max(TRAVEL_FILE_NO) FROM TRAVEL_FILE_TBL WHERE TRAVEL_NO = A.TRAVEL_NO)
ORDER BY TRAVEL_CREATE_DATE DESC
ORDER BY TRAVEL_VIEW_COUNT DESC
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TRAVEL_TBL WHERE TRAVEL_ADDR LIKE '%'||#{searchKeyword}||'%'

SELECT A.TRAVEL_NO, A.TRAVEL_NAME, A.TRAVEL_ADDR, A.TRAVEL_LOCATION, A.TRAVEL_TAGS, A.TRAVEL_VIEW_COUNT, B.TRAVEL_FILE_RENAME FROM TRAVEL_TBL A JOIN TRAVEL_FILE_TBL B ON A.TRAVEL_NO = B.TRAVEL_NO WHERE A.TRAVEL_STATUS = 'Y' AND B.TRAVEL_FILE_NO = (SELECT MAX(TRAVEL_FILE_NO) FROM TRAVEL_FILE_TBL WHERE TRAVEL_NO = A.TRAVEL_NO)
AND A.TRAVEL_ADDR LIKE '%' || #{searchKeyword} || '%' ORDER BY A.TRAVEL_CREATE_DATE DESC
AND A.TRAVEL_ADDR LIKE '%' || #{searchKeyword} || '%' ORDER BY A.TRAVEL_VIEW_COUNT DESC
AND A.TRAVEL_ADDR LIKE '%' || #{searchKeyword} || '%'
ORDER BY A.TRAVEL_CREATE_DATE DESC
ORDER BY A.TRAVEL_VIEW_COUNT DESC
ORDER BY A.TRAVEL_CREATE_DATE DESC
